about.summary: Python library that represents empirical distribution functions

name: empyrical-dist
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.2.0" %}

package:
  name: empyrical-dist
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/e/empyrical_dist/empyrical_dist-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ecb7aef4d6c438ac33b8e74c18ced4ecd97b7f8f81465648ca3750c516b56475

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - numpy
    - pandas
    - matplotlib
    - seaborn

test:
  imports:
    - empyrical_dist

about:
  home: http://github.com/AllenDowney/EmpyricalDistributions
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Python library that represents empirical distribution functions

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ocefpaf
